verses.verse: And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai <S%H5514><s%>, in the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> of the second <S%H8145><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> after they were come out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,
Moreover let the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> keep <S%H6213><s%> the passover <S%H6453><s%> in its appointed season <S%H4150><s%>.

In the fourteenth <S%H702><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of this month <S%H2320><s%>, at even <S%H6153><s%>, ye shall keep <S%H6213><s%> it in its appointed season <S%H4150><s%>: according to all the statutes <S%H2708><s%> of it <S%H4941><s%>, and according to all the ordinances thereof <S%H6213><s%>, shall ye keep it.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, that they should keep <S%H6213><s%> the passover <S%H6453><s%>.

And they kept <S%H6213><s%> the passover <S%H6453><s%> in the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, on the fourteenth <S%H702><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the month <S%H6153><s%>, at even, in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai <S%H5514><s%>: according to all that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>, so did <S%H6213><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And there were certain men <S%H582><s%>, who were unclean <S%H2931><s%> by reason of the dead body <S%H5315><s%> of a man <S%H120><s%>, so that they could <S%H3201><s%> not keep <S%H6213><s%> the passover <S%H6453><s%> on that day <S%H3117><s%>: and they came <S%H7126><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and before <S%H6440><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> on that day <S%H3117><s%>:

and those <S%H1992><s%> men <S%H582><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H2931><s%>, We are unclean by reason of the dead body <S%H5315><s%> of a man <S%H120><s%>: wherefore are we kept back <S%H1639><s%>, that we may not offer <S%H7126><s%> the oblation <S%H7133><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> in its appointed season <S%H4150><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>?
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H5975><s%>, Stay ye <S%H8085><s%>, that I may hear what Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will command concerning you <S%H6680><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, If any <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> of you or of your generations <S%H1755><s%> shall be unclean <S%H2931><s%> by reason of a dead body <S%H5315><s%>, or be on a journey <S%H1870><s%> afar off <S%H7350><s%>, yet he shall keep <S%H6213><s%> the passover <S%H6453><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

In the second <S%H8145><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> on the fourteenth <S%H702><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> at even <S%H6153><s%> they shall keep <S%H6213><s%> it <S%H398><s%>; they shall eat it with unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%> and bitter herbs <S%H4844><s%>:

they shall leave <S%H7604><s%> none of it unto the morning <S%H1242><s%>, nor break <S%H7665><s%> a bone <S%H6106><s%> thereof <S%H2708><s%>: according to all the statute of the passover <S%H6453><s%> they shall keep it <S%H6213><s%>.

But the man <S%H376><s%> that is clean <S%H2889><s%>, and is not on a journey <S%H1870><s%>, and forbeareth <S%H2308><s%> to keep <S%H6213><s%> the passover <S%H6453><s%>, that soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from his people <S%H5971><s%>; because he offered <S%H7126><s%> not the oblation <S%H7133><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> in its appointed season <S%H4150><s%>, that man <S%H376><s%> shall bear <S%H5375><s%> his sin <S%H2399><s%>.

And if a stranger <S%H1616><s%> shall sojourn <S%H1481><s%> among you <S%H6213><s%>, and will keep the passover <S%H6453><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; according to the statute <S%H2708><s%> of the passover <S%H6453><s%>, and according to the ordinance <S%H4941><s%> thereof <S%H6213><s%>, so shall he do: ye shall have one <S%H259><s%> statute <S%H2708><s%>, both for the sojourner <S%H1616><s%>, and for him that is born <S%H249><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>.

And on the day <S%H3117><s%> that the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> was reared up <S%H6965><s%> the cloud <S%H6051><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, even the tent <S%H168><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%>: and at even <S%H6153><s%> it was upon the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> as it were the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%>, until morning <S%H1242><s%>.
So it was alway <S%H8548><s%>: the cloud <S%H6051><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> it <S%H4758><s%>, and the appearance of fire <S%H784><s%> by night <S%H3915><s%>.

And whenever <S%H6310><s%> the cloud <S%H6051><s%> was taken up <S%H5927><s%> from over the Tent <S%H168><s%>, then after <S%H310><s%> that the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> journeyed <S%H5265><s%>: and in the place <S%H4725><s%> where the cloud <S%H6051><s%> abode <S%H7931><s%>, there the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> encamped <S%H2583><s%>.

At the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> journeyed <S%H5265><s%>, and at the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> they encamped <S%H2583><s%>: as long as <S%H3117><s%> the cloud <S%H6051><s%> abode <S%H7931><s%> upon the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> they remained encamped <S%H2583><s%>.

And when the cloud <S%H6051><s%> tarried <S%H748><s%> upon the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, then the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> kept <S%H8104><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and journeyed not <S%H5265><s%>.

And sometimes <S%H3426><s%> the cloud <S%H6051><s%> was a few <S%H4557><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> upon the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>; then according to the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> they remained encamped <S%H2583><s%>, and according to the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> they journeyed <S%H5265><s%>.

And sometimes <S%H3426><s%> the cloud <S%H6051><s%> was from evening <S%H6153><s%> until morning <S%H1242><s%>; and when the cloud <S%H6051><s%> was taken up <S%H5927><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, they journeyed <S%H5265><s%>: or if it continued by day <S%H3119><s%> and by night <S%H3915><s%>, when the cloud <S%H6051><s%> was taken up <S%H5927><s%>, they journeyed <S%H5265><s%>.

Whether it were two days <S%H3117><s%>, or a month <S%H2320><s%>, or a year <S%H3117><s%>, that the cloud <S%H6051><s%> tarried <S%H748><s%> upon the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, abiding <S%H7931><s%> thereon <S%H1121><s%>, the children of Israel <S%H3478><s%> remained encamped <S%H2583><s%>, and journeyed <S%H5265><s%> not <S%H5927><s%>; but when it was taken up, they journeyed <S%H5265><s%>.

At the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> they encamped <S%H2583><s%>, and at the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> they journeyed <S%H5265><s%>: they kept <S%H8104><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, at the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.
